channel.title: Only one question about gangscape v5
channel.description: I started it as my source and it's been practically perfect so far. There is just 1 problem i've noticed the hp is 99 when you can hit in the 100s... i want to change the max hp to 200 can anyone help me with this? :confused:

item.title: Only one question about gangscape v5
item.dc:creator: @459_expert 459 expert
item.description:
@459_expert wrote:

You have to change all the stats, you can’t just change HP. and you can only hit into the 100’s if you are wearing certain equipment. so my advice would to just lower the stats on the certain items.

Read full topic
item.source: Only one question about gangscape v5
